title: The Whiskey Effect
description: Find out how you can read for free-> https://bit.ly/ReadWhiskeyEffectFree _______ I have one rule: never get tied down.When my best friend announces she’s uprooting and moving both she and her daughter a state away I know there’s no way I’m not tagging along. A month in the heart of Lumberjack central? Sign me up!I'm looking for some fun, and spending a month tangled in sheets seems like the way to go. In walks Leo. A sexy as hell plaid-wearing Lumberjack with a heart of gold.I tell myself it’s only a fling, a way to pass the time, and yet as I’m drawn deeper and deeper into his world I worry that when it comes time to leave, I’ll be severing a line that is also tied to my heart.
author: Carmen Bishop
